description: This file contains implementation of task spawning and management functions for the Ansc CoVer3 object, including functions to spawn tasks with varying priorities and stack sizes, as well as the engine task function that executes the spawned tasks.

classes.name: ANSC_COVER3_TASK_INFO
classes.description: Structure holding information about a spawned task, including its context and routine.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCoVer3SpawnTask(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * pTaskEntry,ANSC_HANDLE hTaskContext,char * name)
methods.description: Spawns a new task with default settings, taking the task entry point, context, and name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCoVer3SpawnTask2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * pTaskEntry,ANSC_HANDLE hTaskContext,char * name,int priority)
methods.description: Spawns a new task with specified priority.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCoVer3SpawnTask3(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * pTaskEntry,ANSC_HANDLE hTaskContext,char * name,int priority,ULONG stack_size)
methods.description: Spawns a new task with specified priority and stack size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCoVer3EngineTask(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Function executed by the spawned task to process task routines from the task list.

ctags.name: AnscCoVer3SpawnTask3
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * pTaskEntry,ANSC_HANDLE hTaskContext,char * name,int priority,ULONG stack_size)
